identity.name: Barangay Connect
core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Fintech precision with Tropical warmth.
Emotion First: Every screen must feel like a welcoming neighbor, not a tax collector.
Content is King: Announcements are stories, not just text blocks.
Zoom In: Focus on the detailsâ€”texture of the paper, the grain of the wood.
Negative Space: Let the content breathe.

headings.usage: Use for all section headers, hero titles, and modal titles. Tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for all paragraph text, inputs, and data tables.

mono.usage: Use for transaction IDs, receipt numbers, and code snippets.

typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts or local assets in index.css

primary.description: Deep Emerald - Represents growth, money, and nature.

secondary.description: Terracotta - Represents bricks, home, and warmth.

background.description: Warm Stone - Avoid pure white. Use warm off-white.

surface.description: Pure white for cards to pop against the warm background.

accent.description: Soft Orange - For highlights and 'new' tags.

layout.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Gap-6 for grids.

community_gathering.description: Two women smiling in a crowd

instructions_to_main_agent: DO NOT use default Shadcn styles. Override them with the 'Tropical Modernism' values defined above.
Use the 'Manrope' font for all headings. If it's not available, use a similar geometric sans-serif.
Implement the 'Mobile Nav' as a floating pill at the bottom of the screen for mobile users.
Use the 'Noise' texture as an overlay on the main background to give it a paper-like feel.
For the Admin Dashboard, use the 'Bento Grid' layout (Mode B from the system prompt).
Ensure all financial data (amounts) are displayed in Monospace font.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
